SENT.plain: Left ventricular dimensions and systolic function were studied using echocardiography in 234 patients with Marfan's syndrome without significant valvular regurgitation
Left ventricular dimensions and systolic function were found to be normal in most patients with Marfan's syndrome
Some involvement of the left ventricle may have been present in a small group of these patients
No patients, however, fulfilled the criteria for dilated cardiomyopathy
